q: Tony Dungy served as a confidant for Michael Vick when he signed with the Eagles. He spoke to Michael Vick recently and said the Eagles' free agent quarterback wants to return to Philadelphia next season. He is very grateful to Jeffrey Lurie and Andy Reid for believing in him and giving him an opportunity, Tony Dungy told me. "He loves working with Marty Mornhinweg , he loves the young receivers and all the offensive firepower they have here. But more than anything I think he is just grateful they did give him a

Michael Vick was selected to start Sunday after leading the NFC with more than 1.5 million votes, far ahead of Minnesota Vikings running back Adrian Peterson , the NFC's second-leading vote-getter at 948,410. I'm going to try to put on a great show for the fans, Michael Vick said. In the past, Michael Vick 's running is largely what got him into the Pro Bowl. He takes satisfaction that his passing was better this season than it ever has been.
